backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition serving as a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including PrimeReact setup, TypeScript interfaces, API integration, DataTable display, pagination, and row selection with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, hooks, utilities, and configuration for the Art Institute data table application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Art Institute Data Table application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component rendering Header, ArtworkTable, and Footer in a full-height flex layout with container styling.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkTable.tsx: Main data table component using shadcn/ui Table with server-side pagination, row selection with checkboxes, custom selection panel, and loading/error states for displaying artwork data.
frontend/src/components/CustomSelectionP: Popover component with form input allowing users to select a custom number of rows starting from the first row across pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright year and caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying 'Art Institute of Chicago' title and descriptive subtitle with border and padding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated actors with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkData.ts: Custom hook fetching artwork data from Art Institute of Chicago API for a given page, managing loading, error, and total records state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useSelectionPersisten: Custom React hook managing persistent row selection state with functions for toggling individual/page selections, checking selection status, and handling custom selection counts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/types/artwork.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining Artwork data structure and API response shape with pagination metadata for Art Institute of Chicago API.
frontend/src/utils/selectionCalculator.t: Utility functions for calculating which artwork IDs should be selected across pages using mathematical position-based approach without fetching data from other pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions for colors (using OKLCH), typography, animations, and design system tokens matching the CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting architecture decisions, requirements, and features for a React/TypeScript data table app with Art Institute API integration and persistent selection.
